name: Spartanmod
body:
### About SpartanMod is a Minecraft mod which I started developing in September 2015 at the request of a friend (spartanmine11 on Minecraft) who remarked that feathered hats should be available in Minecraft. I said "why not?" and so I wrote SpartanMod v1.0 on a Friday morning when I had nothing else to do. ### Download [Version 1.0.1](https://github.com/alray2569/SpartanMod/blob/master/builds/spartanmod-1.0.1.jar?raw=true) [Version 1.0](https://github.com/alray2569/SpartanMod/blob/master/builds/spartanmod-1.0.jar?raw=true) ### Requirements * Minecraft 1.7.10 * [Minecraft Forge 1.7.10-10.13.0.1180 or higher.](http://files.minecraftforge.net/) * Java build 17. ### Credits Andrew Ray (@alray2569; alr2569 in Minecraft): Code
Eric Shinkevich (spartanmine11 in Minecraft): Beta Testing
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
